summary: Frontend-only testing of new Interaction Tracking columns and AI Chat Bar on /alt-tracker. All 10 feature requirements verified and passing.
seed_data_creation: N/A - all data is hardcoded in companiesAlt.js with 30 interactionData entries
context_for_next_testing_agent: Alt-tracker at /alt-tracker now has 4 new Interaction Tracking columns (Last Interaction, Type, Key Discussion Points, Next Steps) with integration logos (Google Calendar, Gmail, Outlook) and 'Connected' badge in header. AI Chat bar is at bottom with rotating placeholder queries containing colored sector/category badges. Main tracker at / does NOT have these features. All data is hardcoded in /app/frontend/src/data/companiesAlt.js (interactionData export with 30 entries). Test by scrolling table wrapper to far right to see interaction columns.

tests_passed.alt_tracker_loads_with_30_companies: PASSED - Shows '30 Companies' and 'Showing 30 of 30 companies'
tests_passed.interaction_tracking_header_visible: PASSED - Header shows 'INTERACTION TRACKING' with Google Calendar, Gmail, Outlook SVG logos and 'CONNECTED' badge
tests_passed.last_interaction_column: PASSED - Shows dates like 'Feb 18, 2025' with '371d ago' relative time
tests_passed.type_column: PASSED - Shows Email/Meeting/Call badges with corresponding icons in different colors
tests_passed.key_discussion_points_column: PASSED - Shows 3 bullet points per company (e.g., 'Discussed Series D timeline', 'AI diagnosis tool demo scheduled')
tests_passed.next_steps_column: PASSED - Shows 3 bullet points per company (e.g., 'Send term sheet draft by Feb 25', 'Schedule board meeting for March')
tests_passed.ai_chat_bar_visible: PASSED - Chat bar visible at bottom with MessageSquare icon and Send button
tests_passed.chat_bar_rotating_placeholder: PASSED - Rotating placeholder changes every 4 seconds with colored sector badges (e.g., 'Telemedicine' in pink, 'K-12 Education' in purple)
tests_passed.chat_bar_focus_behavior: PASSED - On focus, placeholder changes to 'Ask about your portfolio companies...' and rotating placeholder hides
tests_passed.main_tracker_unchanged: PASSED - Main tracker at / has NO Interaction Tracking columns and NO AI Chat bar
